description.english: Let the games begin! You signed the contract!
description.german: Lasst die Spiele beginnen! Du hast den Vertrag unterschrieben!
description.french: Que les jeux commencent ! Vous avez signé le contrat !
description.schinese: 游戏开始了！你签了合同！
description.japanese: ゲーム開始！契約書にサインした！
description.italian: Che i giochi abbiano inizio! Hai firmato il contratto!
description.spanish: ¡Que comiencen los juegos! ¡Has firmado el contrato!
description.portuguese: Que comecem os jogos! Assinaste o contrato!
description.dutch: Laat de spellen beginnen! Je hebt het contract getekend!
description.czech: Ať hry začnou! Podepsal jsi smlouvu!
description.brazilian: Que comecem os jogos! Você assinou o contrato!
description.indonesian: Biarkan permainan dimulai! Anda menandatangani kontrak!

description.german: Du hast den ersten Safe geöffnet!
description.french: Vous avez ouvert le premier coffre-fort !
description.schinese: 你打开了第一个保险箱！
description.japanese: 最初の金庫を開けました！
description.dutch: Je hebt de eerste kluis geopend!

displayName.brazilian: Você está na metade do caminho

description.english: You collected the money to save your daughter!
description.german: Du hast das Geld gesammelt, um deine Tochter zu retten!
description.french: Vous avez récupéré l'argent pour sauver votre fille !
description.schinese: 你收集了足够的钱来救你女儿！
description.russian: Ты собрал деньги, чтобы спасти свою дочь!
description.japanese: 娘を救うためのお金を集めた！
description.latam: ¡Recolectaste el dinero para salvar a tu hija!
description.italian: Hai raccolto i soldi per salvare tua figlia!
description.spanish: ¡Has reunido el dinero para salvar a tu hija!
description.portuguese: Juntaste o dinheiro necessário para salvar a tua filha!
description.dutch: Je hebt genoeg geld verzameld om je dochter te redden!
description.czech: Nasbíral jsi peníze na záchranu své dcery!
description.brazilian: Você coletou o dinheiro para salvar sua filha!
description.indonesian: Anda mengumpulkan uang untuk menyelamatkan putri Anda!

description.german: Du hast das ganze Geld eingesammelt!
description.dutch: Je hebt al het beschikbare geld verzameld!

description.german: Du hast den geheimen Koffer gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez trouvé la mallette secrète !
description.japanese: 秘密のケースを見つけた！
description.dutch: Je hebt de geheime koffer gevonden!

description.english: You killed Mike... Was it necessary?
description.german: Du hast Mike getötet... War das nötig?
description.french: Vous avez tué Mike... Était-ce nécessaire ?
description.schinese: 你杀了迈克……这真的有必要吗？
description.russian: Ты убил Майка... Это было необходимо?
description.japanese: マイクを殺した…本当に必要だったのか？
description.italian: Hai ucciso Mike... Era davvero necessario?
description.portuguese: Mataste o Mike... era mesmo necessário?
description.dutch: Je hebt Mike vermoord... was dat echt nodig?
description.czech: Zabil jsi Mika... Bylo to nutné?
description.brazilian: Você matou o Mike... Foi necessário?
description.indonesian: Kau membunuh Mike... Apa itu perlu?

description.english: I love you all... Forgive me...
description.german: Ich liebe euch alle... Vergebt mir...
description.schinese: 我爱你们所有人……请原谅我……
description.russian: Я люблю вас всех... Простите меня...
description.japanese: みんな愛してる…許して…
description.dutch: Ik hou van jullie allemaal... vergeef me...
description.brazilian: Eu amo todos vocês... Me perdoem...
description.indonesian: Aku cinta kalian semua... Maafkan aku...

description.english: Perhaps it would be best to take the easiest route.
description.german: Vielleicht ist der einfachste Weg der beste.
description.french: Peut-être que la solution la plus simple est la meilleure.
description.italian: Forse è meglio scegliere la via più facile.
description.spanish: Quizás lo mejor sea tomar el camino más fácil.
description.schinese: 也许选择最简单的方式是最好的。
description.russian: Возможно, это был самый лёгкий путь.
description.japanese: 一番楽な道を選ぶべきだったかもしれない。
description.portuguese: Talvez tenhas escolhido o caminho mais fácil.
description.dutch: Misschien koos je de makkelijke weg.
description.czech: Možná bylo nejlepší zvolit tu nejjednodušší cestu.
description.turkish: Belki de en kolay yolu seçmek en iyisi olurdu.
description.brazilian: Talvez seja melhor seguir o caminho mais fácil.
description.latam: Quizás sería mejor tomar la ruta más fácil.
description.indonesian: Mungkin akan lebih baik mengambil jalan termudah.

description.english: You found all the symbols and opened the door!
description.german: Du hast alle Symbole gefunden und die Tür geöffnet!
description.french: Vous avez trouvé tous les symboles et ouvert la porte !
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i simboli e aperto la porta!
description.spanish: ¡Has encontrado todos los símbolos y abierto la puerta!
description.schinese: 你找到了所有符号并打开了门！
description.russian: Ты нашёл все символы и открыл дверь!
description.japanese: 全てのシンボルを見つけて扉を開けた！
description.portuguese: Encontraste todos os símbolos e abriste a porta!
description.dutch: Je hebt alle symbolen gevonden en de deur geopend!
description.czech: Našel jsi všechny symboly a otevřel dveře!
description.turkish: Tüm sembolleri buldun ve kapıyı açtın!
description.brazilian: Você encontrou todos os símbolos e abriu a porta!
description.latam: ¡Encontraste todos los símbolos y abriste la puerta!
description.indonesian: Anda menemukan semua simbol dan membuka pintu!

displayName.italian: Un futuro con la mia famiglia.

description.english: You got the money to save your daughter!
description.german: Du hast das Geld bekommen, um deine Tochter zu retten!
description.french: Vous avez obtenu l'argent pour sauver votre fille !
description.italian: Hai ottenuto i soldi per salvare tua figlia!
description.spanish: ¡Has conseguido el dinero para salvar a tu hija!
description.schinese: 你得到了救你女儿所需的钱！
description.russian: Ты добыл деньги, чтобы спасти свою дочь!
description.japanese: 娘を救うためのお金を手に入れた！
description.portuguese: Obtiveste o dinheiro necessário para salvar a tua filha!
description.dutch: Je hebt genoeg geld verzameld om je dochter te redden!
description.czech: Získal jsi peníze na záchranu své dcery!
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu o dinheiro para salvar sua filha!
description.latam: ¡Conseguiste el dinero para salvar a tu hija!
description.indonesian: Anda mendapatkan uang untuk menyelamatkan putri Anda!

description.english: You're too weak to save your daughter.
description.german: Du bist zu schwach, um deine Tochter zu retten.
description.french: Vous êtes trop faible pour sauver votre fille.
description.italian: Sei troppo debole per salvare tua figlia.
description.spanish: Eres demasiado débil para salvar a tu hija.
description.schinese: 你太弱了，无法救你的女儿。
description.russian: Ты слишком слаб, чтобы спасти свою дочь.
description.japanese: あなたは娘を救うには弱すぎた。
description.portuguese: Foste demasiado fraco para salvar a tua filha.
description.dutch: Je was te zwak om je dochter te redden.
description.czech: Jsi příliš slabý na to, aby ses zachránil svou dceru.
description.brazilian: Você é fraco demais para salvar sua filha.
description.latam: Eres demasiado débil para salvar a tu hija.
description.indonesian: Anda terlalu lemah untuk menyelamatkan putri Anda.

description.english: You managed to escape with Mike!
description.german: Du hast es geschafft, mit Mike zu entkommen!
description.french: Vous avez réussi à vous échapper avec Mike !
description.italian: Sei riuscito a fuggire con Mike!
description.schinese: 你和迈克一起成功逃脱了！
description.japanese: マイクと一緒に脱出した！
description.dutch: Je bent samen met Mike ontsnapt!
description.czech: Podařilo se ti utéct s Mikem!
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu escapar com o Mike!
description.indonesian: Anda berhasil melarikan diri bersama Mike!

description.english: I won! I beat the game!
description.german: Ich habe gewonnen! Ich habe das Spiel besiegt!
description.french: J'ai gagné ! J'ai terminé le jeu !
description.italian: Ho vinto! Ho battuto il gioco!
description.schinese: 我赢了！我通关了这款游戏！
description.japanese: 勝った！ゲームをクリアした！
description.dutch: Je hebt het gehaald! Je hebt het spel voltooid!
description.brazilian: Eu venci! Eu zerei o jogo!
